title: Tales of the Dead: Ghost Stories of the Villa Diodati
description: Tales of the Dead was an English anthology of horror fiction, abridged from the French book Fantasmagoriana and translated anonymously by Sarah Elizabeth Utterson, who also added one story of her own. It was published in 1813 by White, Cochrane and Co.Introduction (Tales of the Dead) • essay by Terry HaleThe Family Portraits • novelette by A. Apel (trans. of Die Bilder der Ahnen 1805) [as by Anonymous]The Fated Hour • novelette by F. Laun (trans. of Die Verwandtschaft mit der Geisterwelt 1810) [as by Friedrich Shultz]The Death's Head • novelette by F. Laun (trans. of Der Todtenkopf 1811) [as by Friedrich Shultz]The Dead-Bride • novella by F. Laun (trans. of Die Todtenbraut 1811) [as by Friedrich Shultz]The Storm • (1992) • short fiction by Sarah Elizabeth Utterson [as by Sarah Elizabeth Brown Utterson]The Spectre Barber • novella by Johann Karl August Musäus (trans. of Stumme Liebe 1782) [as by J. K. Musaus]
author: Sarah Elizabeth Utterson
